overview: One out of three passengers does not feel secure during a flight. The team at PilotsEye.tv had the opportunity to accompany 12 participants of a Lufthansa Aviophobia workshop during the entire training. These workshops have been successful for the past 30 years. The trainer, psychologist Antonia Arboleda-Hahnemann, works together with the participants for the cause of the uncomfortable feeling between takeoff and landing. "Flying Relaxed - Overcoming the Fear of Flying" views the flight to Hamburg from three perspectives: from the cabin, from the technology, and from air traffic control.
title: PilotsEYE.tv Entspannt Fliegen
